edge Edge

The edge to animate.

targetColor Color

Target color.

AnimateGroupCollapse(string, double, Action?)

Animates a group collapsing with sequenced transitions:

  1. Children nodes and edges fade out together
  2. Group shrinks
public void AnimateGroupCollapse(string groupId, double duration = 0.5, Action? onComplete = null)

Parameters

groupId string

The ID of the group to collapse.

duration double

Total animation duration in seconds (default: 0.5).

onComplete Action

Optional callback when animation completes.

AnimateGroupExpand(string, double, Action?)

Animates a group expanding with sequenced transitions:

  1. Group grows
  2. Children nodes and edges fade in together
public void AnimateGroupExpand(string groupId, double duration = 0.5, Action? onComplete = null)

Parameters

groupId string

The ID of the group to expand.

duration double

Total animation duration in seconds (default: 0.5).

onComplete Action

Optional callback when animation completes.

AnimateNodesAppear(IEnumerable<Node>, double, double, Action?)

Animates multiple nodes appearing with staggered effect.

public void AnimateNodesAppear(IEnumerable<Node> nodes, double duration = 0.3, double stagger = 0.05, Action? onComplete = null)

Parameters

nodes IEnumerable<Node>

The nodes to animate.

duration double

Animation duration per node in seconds (default: 0.3).

stagger double

Delay between each node's animation start (default: 0.05).

onComplete Action

Optional callback when all animations complete.

BeginEditNodeLabel(Node)

Begins inline editing for a node's label. In visual tree mode, uses the node's renderer to show an inline TextBox. In direct rendering mode, creates a TextBox overlay at the node's position.

public bool BeginEditNodeLabel(Node node)

Parameters

node Node

The node to edit.

Returns

bool

True if editing started successfully.

Cut()

Cuts selected nodes to the clipboard.

public void Cut()

DisableDataFlow()

Disables data flow processing and disposes the executor.

public void DisableDataFlow()

DisableDirectRendering()

Disables direct rendering mode and returns to normal visual tree rendering.

public void DisableDirectRendering()

DisableSimplifiedRendering()

Disables simplified rendering and restores the default node renderers.

public void DisableSimplifiedRendering()

Duplicate()

Duplicates selected nodes in place.

public void Duplicate()

EnableDataFlow()

Enables data flow processing for this canvas. Creates a GraphExecutor that will handle value propagation between connected nodes.

public GraphExecutor EnableDataFlow()

Returns

GraphExecutor

The created GraphExecutor.

EnableDirectRendering()

Enables direct GPU-accelerated rendering mode for maximum performance with very large graphs. This bypasses the Avalonia visual tree entirely and draws directly to a DrawingContext. Supports custom node renderers via IDirectNodeRenderer interface.

public void EnableDirectRendering()

EnableSimplifiedRendering()

Enables simplified node rendering for better performance with large graphs. This replaces the default renderer with a minimal renderer that uses fewer visual elements. Call before loading a large graph.

public void EnableSimplifiedRendering()

EndDataFlowBatch()

Ends a batch update and executes all affected nodes.

public void EndDataFlowBatch()

EndEditNodeLabel(Node)

Ends inline editing for a node's label and commits the change.

public void EndEditNodeLabel(Node node)

Parameters

node Node

The node being edited.

ExecuteFromNode(string)

Executes only nodes affected by a change to the specified node.

public void ExecuteFromNode(string nodeId)

Parameters

nodeId string

The node that changed.

ExecuteGraph()

Executes the entire graph in topological order.

public void ExecuteGraph()

ExpandAllGroups()

public void ExpandAllGroups()

GetProcessor(string)

Gets a processor by node ID.

public INodeProcessor? GetProcessor(string nodeId)

Parameters

nodeId string

The node ID.

Returns

INodeProcessor

The processor, or null if not found.

GetProcessor<T>(string)

Gets a typed processor by node ID.

public T? GetProcessor<T>(string nodeId) where T : class, INodeProcessor

Parameters

nodeId string

The node ID.

Returns

T

The processor, or null if not found or wrong type.

Type Parameters

T

The processor type.

Invoked when an unhandled Avalonia.Input.InputElement.KeyDownEvent reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class. Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

Parameters

StartEdgeFlowAnimation(Edge, double, bool)

Starts a continuous flow animation on an edge (animated dashed line).

public EdgeFlowAnimation StartEdgeFlowAnimation(Edge edge, double speed = 50, bool reverse = false)

Parameters

edge Edge

The edge to animate.

speed double

Speed of the flow animation (default: 50).

reverse bool

If true, flow goes from target to source. If false (default), flow goes from source to target.

Returns

EdgeFlowAnimation

The animation instance (can be used to stop it later).

StopAllAnimations()

Stops all running animations.

public void StopAllAnimations()

StopEdgeFlowAnimation(EdgeFlowAnimation)

Stops an edge flow animation.

public void StopEdgeFlowAnimation(EdgeFlowAnimation animation)

Parameters

animation EdgeFlowAnimation

The animation to stop.

ZoomToAnimated(double, double, Func<double, double>?)

Smoothly animates to a specific zoom level.

public void ZoomToAnimated(double targetZoom, double duration = 0.2, Func<double, double>? easing = null)

Parameters

targetZoom double

Target zoom level.

duration double

Animation duration in seconds (default: 0.2).

easing Func<double, double>

Optional easing function.
